name: SUPABASE__CREATE_SSO_PROVIDER
description: Create a new Single Sign-On (SSO) provider in Supabase for enterprise authentication integration.

name: SUPABASE__REMOVE_SSO_PROVIDER
description: Remove an SSO provider by its UUID. from Supabase.

name: SUPABASE__SSO_PROVIDER
description: Delete an SSO provider configuration from a Supabase project.

name: SUPABASE__AUTH_CONFIG
description: Get the authentication configuration for a Supabase project including providers and security settings.

name: SUPABASE__LIST_SSO_PROVIDERS
description: List all configured Single Sign-On (SSO) providers for a Supabase project.

name: SUPABASE__DISABLE_READONLY_MODE
description: Disable project's readonly mode for the next 15 minutes. via Supabase.

name: SUPABASE__GENERATE_TYPESCRIPT_TYPES
description: Generate TypeScript types of your schema for use with supabase-js.

name: SUPABASE__LIST_ORGANIZATIONS
description: List all organizations accessible to your Supabase account.

name: SUPABASE__LIST_ORGANIZATION_MEMBERS
description: List all members of a Supabase organization with their roles.

name: SUPABASE__ORGANIZATION
description: Get detailed information about a Supabase organization.

name: SUPABASE__CREATE_ORGANIZATION
description: Create a new organization in Supabase for team management.

name: SUPABASE__LIST_PROJECTS
description: List all projects in your Supabase organization.

name: SUPABASE__PROJECT_GET_PROJECTS
description: Get detailed information about a specific Supabase project.

name: SUPABASE__CREATE_PROJECT
description: Create a new project in Supabase with database and auth services.

name: SUPABASE__PROJECT_DELETE_PROJECTS
description: Delete a project from Supabase permanently (cannot be undone).

name: SUPABASE__RESTORE_PROJECT
description: Restore a paused Supabase project to resume services.

name: SUPABASE__PAUSE_PROJECT
description: Pause a Supabase project to stop services and reduce costs.

name: SUPABASE__CANCEL_PROJECT_RESTORATION
description: Cancel an in-progress project restoration in Supabase.

name: SUPABASE__PROJECT_HEALTH_STATUS
description: Get the health status of all services in a Supabase project.

services.description: Comma-separated list of services to check health for (e.g., 'auth,db,pooler,realtime,rest,storage')

timeout_ms.description: Timeout in milliseconds for the health check

name: SUPABASE__PROJECT_API_KEYS
description: Get the API keys for a Supabase project including anon and service role keys.

reveal.description: Whether to reveal the API keys

name: SUPABASE__RUN_SQL_QUERY
description: Run a SQL query against your Supabase PostgreSQL database (Beta).

name: SUPABASE__LIST_ALL_EDGE_FUNCTIONS
description: List all Edge Functions deployed in a Supabase project.

name: SUPABASE__CREATE_EDGE_FUNCTION
description: Create an edge function (deprecated - use deploy endpoint) in Supabase.

name: SUPABASE__EDGE_FUNCTION_DELETE_FUNCTIONS
description: Delete an Edge Function from a Supabase project.

name: SUPABASE__EDGE_FUNCTION_GET_FUNCTIONS
description: Get details about a specific Supabase Edge Function.

name: SUPABASE__UPDATE_EDGE_FUNCTION
description: Update an existing Edge Function in a Supabase project.

name: SUPABASE__EDGE_FUNCTION_BODY
description: Get the source code body of a Supabase Edge Function.
